meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of orchids.
meanings.sent1: The orchidaceous flowers in the garden were vibrant and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had an orchidaceous pattern that reminded me of a blooming orchid.
meanings.sent3: The orchidaceous decorations at the party added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent4: The dancer moved with an orchidaceous grace, resembling the delicate petals of a flower.
meanings.sent5: The perfume had an orchidaceous scent that lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: Resembling or having the characteristics of an orchid.
meanings.sent1: The painting captured the orchidaceous colors of the sunset perfectly.
meanings.sent2: Her hair was styled in an orchidaceous bun, resembling the shape of a flower.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with orchidaceous icing that looked almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The fabric had an orchidaceous softness, gentle to the touch like a petal.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with an orchidaceous fragrance, creating a soothing atmosphere.
